reasoning: Osteopenia is a chronic bone condition measured by DEXA scan T-scores (-1.0 to -2.5 SD). Prevalence preferred over incidence for this chronic condition. Global estimate ~8.5% of adult population based on WHO diagnostic criteria and population-based studies (NHANES and similar).
source: Kanis JA et al. (2008). Assessment of osteoporosis at the primary health-care level. WHO Scientific Group Technical Report Series 939
